introduction_japanese: 移す。物や人、データや話題を別のところへ動かすときに使います。病気を人に広げる場面でもよく出ます。
introduction_english: The verb うつす is used when moving things or people, or shifting data or a topic to another place or person. It’s also used when passing an illness to someone.
meaning_explanation_japanese: ある物や人を一方から別の場所へ動かしたり、時間・話題・注意を別のほうへ変えたりすることです。中身やデータを別の入れ物や機器へうつし替える感じです。さらに、病気を人に感染させる意味もあります。
meaning_explanation_english: うつす means moving or shifting something from A to B. You can also use it for changing time, topic, or attention, and for transferring contents or data between containers or devices. It also means to infect someone with an illness.
youtube_description: Learn うつす the easy way: move/shift things, transfer data, reschedule, and even “to infect.” Clear examples, common mistakes, and quick practice.
kanji_explanation: The first kanji means move or shift. You see it in いどう, which is about movement. Another common word is いてん, a more formal “relocation.” Think of sliding from one place to another.
synonyms: 動かす : うごかす : to move (something)
移転する : いてんする : to relocate
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word are うごかす and いてんする. うごかす overlaps for physically moving an object. いてんする is formal and is used for offices, shops, or addresses moving to a new location.
antonyms: 固定する : こていする : to fix in place
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word is こていする, which means to keep something in one place and not change it. It contrasts with moving or shifting something elsewhere.

collocations.furigana: 場(ば)所(しょ)を移(うつ)す
席(せき)を前(まえ)に移(うつ)す

translations.VI: Di chuyển ghế của bạn về phía trước
translations.FA: صندلی خود را به جلو حرکت دهید

collocations.furigana: 店(みせ)を郊外(こうがい)に移(うつ)す

translations.EN: move one's store to the suburbs
translations.ES: trasladar su tienda a los suburbios
translations.VI: chuyển cửa hàng của một người ra vùng ngoại ô
translations.TL: ilipat ang isang tindahan sa mga suburb
translations.HI: अपनी दुकान को उपनगरों में ले जाना
translations.FA: مغازه خود را به حومه شهر منتقل کردن

collocations.furigana: 本(ほん)社(しゃ)を東(とう)京(きょう)に移(うつ)す

translations.TL: Ang punong tanggapan ay lumipat sa Tokyo
translations.AR: تم نقل المكتب الرئيسي إلى طوكيو
translations.FA: دفتر مرکزی به توکیو منتقل شد

translations.TL: Ilipat ang takdang petsa sa susunod na linggo

translations.TL: ilipat ang atensyon sa ibang bansa

example_sentences.furigana: 店(みせ)を郊外(こうがい)に移(うつ)す。

translations.EN: Move the store to the suburbs.
translations.ES: Trasladar la tienda a los suburbios.
translations.VI: Chuyển cửa hàng ra vùng ngoại ô.
translations.TL: Ilipat ang tindahan sa mga suburb.
translations.HI: दुकान को उपनगरों में ले जाएं।
translations.FA: فروشگاه را به حومه شهر منتقل کنید.

example_sentences.kanji: 席を前に移してください。
example_sentences.furigana: 席(せき)を前(まえ)に移(うつ)して下(くだ)さい。

translations.ES: Por favor, mueva su asiento hacia adelante.
translations.VI: Xin hãy di chuyển ghế của bạn về phía trước.
translations.BN: দয়া করে আপনার আসনটি সামনের দিকে সরিয়ে নিন।
translations.ZH: 请将您的座位向前移动。
translations.TL: Mangyaring ilipat ang iyong upuan pasulong.
translations.HI: कृपया अपनी सीट आगे बढ़ा लें।
translations.AR: من فضلك حرك مقعدك إلى الأمام.
translations.FA: لطفا صندلی خود را جلوتر بیاورید.

example_sentences.furigana: 話(わ)題(だい)を次(つぎ)に移(うつ)そう。

translations.EN: Let's move on to the next topic.
translations.ID: Mari kita lanjut ke topik berikutnya.
translations.VI: Chúng ta hãy chuyển sang chủ đề tiếp theo.
translations.TL: Lumipat tayo sa susunod na paksa.
translations.MY: နောက်အကြောင်းအရာတစ်ခုသို့ ဆက်သွားကြပါစို့။
translations.HI: आइये अगले विषय पर चलते हैं।

example_sentences.kanji: ファイルを新しいフォルダに移しました。
example_sentences.furigana: ファイルを新(あたら)しいフォルダに移(うつ)しました。

translations.EN: I moved the files to a new folder.
translations.ID: Saya memindahkan file-file tersebut ke folder baru.
translations.ES: Moví los archivos a una nueva carpeta.
translations.VI: Tôi đã di chuyển các tập tin vào một thư mục mới.
translations.FR: J'ai déplacé les fichiers vers un nouveau dossier.
translations.ZH: 我将文件移动到了一个新文件夹。
translations.TL: Inilipat ko ang mga file sa isang bagong folder.
translations.MY: ဖိုင်များကို ဖိုင်တွဲအသစ်တစ်ခုသို့ ရွှေ့လိုက်ပါသည်။
translations.HI: मैंने फ़ाइलों को एक नए फ़ोल्डर में स्थानांतरित कर दिया।
translations.FA: فایل‌ها را به یک پوشه جدید منتقل کردم.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は風邪を私に移した。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は風(かぜ)邪(かぜ)を私(わたし)に移(うつ)した。

translations.EN: He passed the cold on to me.
translations.VI: Anh ấy đã truyền bệnh cảm lạnh cho tôi.
translations.BN: সে আমার মধ্যে ঠান্ডাটা ঢুকিয়ে দিল।
translations.TL: Pinasa niya sa akin ang lamig.
translations.MY: အအေးဓာတ်က ငါ့ဆီ ကူးသွားတယ်။
translations.FA: سرما رو به منم منتقل کرد.

english_definitions: to transfer (to a different place, group, etc.)
to move to the next stage (of a plan, etc.)
to permeate something (with a color, smell, etc.)
